pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kiener Distributions and Fat Tails in Finance // Kiener distributions K1, K2, K3 and K4 to characterize distributions with left and right, symmetric or asymmetric fat tails in market finance, neuroscience and other disciplines. Two algorithms to estimate with a high accuracy distribution parameters, quantiles, value-at-risk and expected shortfall. Also, power hyperbolas and power hyperbolic functions. Some functions introduced in v1.2-0 were suppressed.
